EmailTemplate.name: 202004_APAC_AIN_Survey_MC.202004_APAC_AIN_Survey_Email1_MC
EmailTemplate.subject: Solving Your Challenges – Honeywell is here for you!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Valued Customer,
We hope this finds you safe and doing as best we all can during this COVID-19 challenge.
We would like to share some resources that can help you navigate and get problems solved quickly with our professional customer support team and service apps. Regardless if it is a question on a product, or an AOG emergency, you will find the support you are looking for at our website: Customer and Product Support Made Simple and Easy <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/pages/customer-and-product-support-made-simple-and-easy]]>.
There will come a point when the COVID-19 crisis begins to fade, but regardless, we are always here for you. We look forward to hearing from you at Contact Us <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/contact-us?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=20_apac_bga_ain]]>.
Kind regards,
Customer & Product Support Team Honeywell Aerospace
